CheckTitle: Ensure All Member Users Are MFA Capable
Description: Checks if all member users are MFA capable.
Risk: If any member user is not MFA capable, the organization is at increased risk of account compromise.

Code.Other: 1. Go to Azure Portal (https://portal.azure.com). 2. Navigate to Azure Active Directory > Security > Authentication methods. 3. Ensure all users are registered for MFA.

Recommendation.Text: Ensure all member users are MFA capable to reduce risk of account compromise.

Notes: This check validates that all member users are MFA capable.
